Stonebridge Venue
Wedding

The Lawn

The expansive front lawn blends the classic landscaping of the manor with the natural beauty of a quaint brook and large pond. It is framed with mature trees that are waiting for your dreams of your wedding.

Learn more »

Carriage House

The Carriage House features cathedral ceilings with exposed wood beams, stone-covered front wall, second floor balcony, oversized light fixtures and large windows flooding the space with plenty of natural light.

Learn more »

Celebration Tent

During your reception, guests can celebrate with you in the comfort of a beautiful 40' x 120' white special event tent, complete with dance floor, chandeliers and cloth draped tables to delight the crowd.

Learn more »

Experiencing Stonebridge

Discover Stonebridge

Situated on 32 private acres, just 133 miles west of Washington, D.C., StoneBridge is a charming country estate with a variety of outdoor event settings suitable for up to 250 guests. You arrive at the estate and park in Pennsylvania; but as you stroll the property you enter into Maryland, crossing the historic Mason-Dixon Line. At StoneBridge, North meets South and dreams meet reality. StoneBridge embraces traditions both old and new, and it's secluded scenery is the perfect backdrop for your special event. Our exceptional service and attention to detail will allow you to focus on what is truly important. Let us help you make your affair unforgettable.

Our customers love us! Read what they have to say below.

Gorgeous setting, incredibly efficient staff! Highly recommend# Tent setting was elegant withe the chandeliers and was very impressed with the size of the round tsbles. We easily sat 12 chairs at our table.

Jeanie Laffey

As a local photographer, I highly recommend this venue to any couple looking for an amazing wedding location! The inside, outside, AND the tent is the most gorgeous place I've ever photographed! Thank you Stonebridge for being so helpful and accommodating!

Kyra Lashley

We had our daughters wedding here this summer and it was absolutely magical. The staff the day of the wedding made everything flow effortlessly. The beauty of this Venue is one of a kind!

Cindy Diamond
